00035   void interpolateData(ot::DA* da, Vec in, Vec out, Vec* gradOut,
00036       unsigned int dof, std::vector<double>& pts) {
00037 
00038     assert(da != NULL);
00039 
00040     int rank = da->getRankAll();
00041     int npes = da->getNpesAll();
00042     MPI_Comm comm = da->getComm();
00043 
00044     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> minBlocks;
00045     unsigned int maxDepth;
00046 
00047     int npesActive;
00048     if(!rank) {
00049       minBlocks = da->getMinAllBlocks();
00050       maxDepth = da->getMaxDepth();
00051       npesActive = da->getNpesActive();
00052     }
00053 
00054     par::Mpi_Bcast<unsigned int>(&maxDepth, 1, 0, comm);
00055     par::Mpi_Bcast<int>(&npesActive, 1, 0, comm);
00056 
00057     unsigned int balOctMaxD = (maxDepth - 1);
00058 
00059     if(rank) {
00060       minBlocks.resize(npesActive);
00061     }
00062 
00063     par::Mpi_Bcast<ot::TreeNode>(&(*(minBlocks.begin())), npesActive, 0, comm);
00064 
00065     std::vector<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 3> > ptsWrapper;
00066 
00067     int numPts = (pts.size())/3;
00068     double xyzFac = static_cast<double>(1u << balOctMaxD);
00069     for(int i = 0; i < numPts; i++) {
00070       ot::NodeAndValues<double, 3> tmpObj;
00071       unsigned int xint = static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[(3*i)]*xyzFac);
00072       unsigned int yint = static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[(3*i) + 1]*xyzFac);
00073       unsigned int zint = static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[(3*i) + 2]*xyzFac);
00074       tmpObj.node = ot::TreeNode(xint, yint, zint, maxDepth, 3, maxDepth);
00075       tmpObj.values[0] = pts[(3*i)];
00076       tmpObj.values[1] = pts[(3*i) + 1];
00077       tmpObj.values[2] = pts[(3*i) + 2];
00078       ptsWrapper.push_back(tmpObj);
00079     }//end for i
00080 
00081     //Re-distribute ptsWrapper to align with minBlocks
00082     int* sendCnts = new int[npes];
00083     assert(sendCnts);
00084 
00085     int* tmpSendCnts = new int[npes];
00086     assert(tmpSendCnts);
00087 
00088     for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00089       sendCnts[i] = 0;
00090       tmpSendCnts[i] = 0;
00091     }//end for i
00092 
00093     unsigned int *part = NULL;
00094     if(numPts) {
00095       part = new unsigned int[numPts];
00096       assert(part);
00097     }
00098 
00099     for(int i = 0; i < numPts; i++) {
00100       bool found = seq::maxLowerBound<ot::TreeNode>(minBlocks,
00101           ptsWrapper[i].node, part[i], NULL, NULL);
00102       assert(found);
00103       assert(part[i] < npes);
00104       sendCnts[part[i]]++;
00105     }//end for i
00106 
00107     int* sendDisps = new int[npes];
00108     assert(sendDisps);
00109 
00110     sendDisps[0] = 0;
00111     for(int i = 1; i < npes; i++) {
00112       sendDisps[i] = sendDisps[i-1] + sendCnts[i-1];
00113     }//end for i
00114 
00115     std::vector<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 3> > sendList(numPts);
00116 
00117     unsigned int *commMap = NULL;
00118     if(numPts) {
00119       commMap = new unsigned int[numPts];
00120       assert(commMap);
00121     }
00122 
00123     for(int i = 0; i < numPts; i++) {
00124       unsigned int pId = part[i];
00125       unsigned int sId = (sendDisps[pId] + tmpSendCnts[pId]);
00126       assert(sId < numPts);
00127       sendList[sId] = ptsWrapper[i];
00128       commMap[sId] = i;
00129       tmpSendCnts[pId]++;
00130     }//end for i
00131 
00132     if(part) {
00133       delete [] part;
00134       part = NULL;
00135     }
00136     delete [] tmpSendCnts;
00137 
00138     ptsWrapper.clear();
00139 
00140     int* recvCnts = new int[npes];
00141     assert(recvCnts);
00142 
00143     par::Mpi_Alltoall<int>(sendCnts, recvCnts, 1, comm);
00144 
00145     int* recvDisps = new int[npes];
00146     assert(recvDisps);
00147 
00148     recvDisps[0] = 0;
00149     for(int i = 1; i < npes; i++) {
00150       recvDisps[i] = recvDisps[i-1] + recvCnts[i-1];
00151     }//end for i
00152 
00153     std::vector<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 3> > recvList(recvDisps[npes - 1] + recvCnts[npes - 1]);
00154 
00155     ot::NodeAndValues<double, 3>* sendListPtr = NULL;
00156     ot::NodeAndValues<double, 3>* recvListPtr = NULL;
00157 
00158     if(!(sendList.empty())) {
00159       sendListPtr = (&(*(sendList.begin())));
00160     }
00161 
00162     if(!(recvList.empty())) {
00163       recvListPtr = (&(*(recvList.begin())));
00164     }
00165 
00166     par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 3> >(sendListPtr, 
00167         sendCnts, sendDisps, recvListPtr, recvCnts, recvDisps, comm);
00168     sendList.clear();
00169 
00170     //Sort recvList but also store the mapping to the original order
00171     std::vector<seq::IndexHolder<ot::NodeAndValues<double, 3> > > localList(recvList.size());
00172     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < recvList.size(); i++) {
00173       localList[i].index = i;
00174       localList[i].value = &(*(recvList.begin() + i));
00175     }//end for i
00176 
00177     sort(localList.begin(), localList.end());
00178 
00179     bool computeGradient = (gradOut != NULL);
00180 
00181     std::vector<double> tmpOut(dof*localList.size());
00182     std::vector<double> tmpGradOut;
00183     if(computeGradient) {
00184       tmpGradOut.resize(3*dof*localList.size());
00185     }
00186 
00187     PetscScalar* inArr;
00188     da->vecGetBuffer(in, inArr, false, false, true, dof);
00189 
00190     if(da->iAmActive()) {
00191       da->ReadFromGhostsBegin<PetscScalar>(inArr, dof);
00192       da->ReadFromGhostsEnd<PetscScalar>(inArr);
00193 
00194       //interpolate at the received points
00195       //The pts must be inside the domain and not on the positive boundaries
00196       unsigned int ptsCtr = 0;
00197       double hxFac = (1.0/static_cast<double>(1u << balOctMaxD));
00198       for(da->init<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>();
00199           (da->curr() < da->end<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>()) && 
00200           (ptsCtr < localList.size()); da->next<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>()) {
00201 
00202         Point pt = da->getCurrentOffset();
00203         unsigned int currLev = da->getLevel(da->curr());
00204 
00205         ot::TreeNode currOct(pt.xint(), pt.yint(), pt.zint(), currLev, 3, maxDepth);
00206 
00207         unsigned int indices[8];
00208         da->getNodeIndices(indices);
00209 
00210         unsigned char childNum = da->getChildNumber();
00211         unsigned char hnMask = da->getHangingNodeIndex(da->curr());
00212         unsigned char elemType = 0;
00213         GET_ETYPE_BLOCK(elemType, hnMask, childNum)
00214 
00215           double x0 = (pt.x())*hxFac;
00216         double y0 = (pt.y())*hxFac;
00217         double z0 = (pt.z())*hxFac;
00218         double hxOct = (static_cast<double>(1u << (maxDepth - currLev)))*hxFac;
00219 
00220         //All the recieved points lie within some octant or the other.
00221         //So the ptsCtr will be incremented properly inside this loop.
00222         //Evaluate at all points within this octant
00223         while( (ptsCtr < localList.size()) &&
00224             ( (currOct == ((localList[ptsCtr].value)->node)) ||
00225               (currOct.isAncestor(((localList[ptsCtr].value)->node))) ) ) {
00226 
00227           double px = ((localList[ptsCtr].value)->values)[0];
00228           double py = ((localList[ptsCtr].value)->values)[1];
00229           double pz = ((localList[ptsCtr].value)->values)[2];
00230           double xloc =  (2.0*(px - x0)/hxOct) - 1.0;
00231           double yloc =  (2.0*(py - y0)/hxOct) - 1.0;
00232           double zloc =  (2.0*(pz - z0)/hxOct) - 1.0;
00233 
00234           double ShFnVals[8];
00235           for(int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00236             ShFnVals[j] = ( ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][0] + 
00237                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][1]*xloc) +
00238                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][2]*yloc) +
00239                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][3]*zloc) +
00240                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][4]*xloc*yloc) +
00241                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][5]*yloc*zloc) +
00242                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][6]*zloc*xloc) +
00243                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][7]*xloc*yloc*zloc) );
00244           }//end for j
00245 
00246           unsigned int outIdx = localList[ptsCtr].index;
00247 
00248           for(int k = 0; k < dof; k++) {
00249             tmpOut[(dof*outIdx) + k] = 0.0;
00250             for(int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00251               tmpOut[(dof*outIdx) + k] += (inArr[(dof*indices[j]) + k]*ShFnVals[j]);
00252             }//end for j
00253           }//end for k
00254 
00255           if(computeGradient) {
00256 
00257             double GradShFnVals[8][3];
00258             for(int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00259               GradShFnVals[j][0] = ( ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][1] +
00260                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][4]*yloc) +
00261                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][6]*zloc) +
00262                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][7]*yloc*zloc) );
00263 
00264               GradShFnVals[j][1] = ( ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][2] +
00265                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][4]*xloc) +
00266                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][5]*zloc) +
00267                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][7]*xloc*zloc) );
00268 
00269               GradShFnVals[j][2] = ( ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][3] +
00270                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][5]*yloc) +
00271                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][6]*xloc) +
00272                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][7]*xloc*yloc) );            
00273             }//end for j
00274 
00275             double gradFac = (2.0/hxOct);
00276 
00277             for(int k = 0; k < dof; k++) {
00278               for(int l = 0; l < 3; l++) {
00279                 tmpGradOut[(3*dof*outIdx) + (3*k) + l] = 0.0;
00280                 for(int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00281                   tmpGradOut[(3*dof*outIdx) + (3*k) + l] += (inArr[(dof*indices[j]) + k]*GradShFnVals[j][l]);
00282                 }//end for j
00283                 tmpGradOut[(3*dof*outIdx) + (3*k) + l] *= gradFac;
00284               }//end for l
00285             }//end for k
00286 
00287           }//end if need grad
00288 
00289           ptsCtr++;
00290         }//end while
00291 
00292       }//end writable loop
00293     } else {
00294       assert(localList.empty());
00295     }//end if active
00296 
00297     da->vecRestoreBuffer(in, inArr, false, false, true, dof);
00298 
00299     recvList.clear();
00300     localList.clear();
00301 
00302     //Return the results. This communication is the exact reverse of the earlier
00303     //communication.
00304 
00305     std::vector<double> results(dof*numPts);
00306     for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00307       sendCnts[i] *= dof;
00308       sendDisps[i] *= dof;
00309       recvCnts[i] *= dof;
00310       recvDisps[i] *= dof;
00311     }//end for i
00312 
00313     double* tmpOutPtr = NULL;
00314     double* resultsPtr = NULL;
00315 
00316     if(!(tmpOut.empty())) {
00317       tmpOutPtr = (&(*(tmpOut.begin())));
00318     }
00319 
00320     if(!(results.empty())) {
00321       resultsPtr = (&(*(results.begin())));
00322     }
00323 
00324     par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<double>( tmpOutPtr, recvCnts, recvDisps,
00325         resultsPtr, sendCnts, sendDisps, comm);
00326     tmpOut.clear();
00327 
00328     std::vector<double> gradResults;
00329     if(computeGradient) {
00330       for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00331         sendCnts[i] *= 3;
00332         sendDisps[i] *= 3;
00333         recvCnts[i] *= 3;
00334         recvDisps[i] *= 3;
00335       }//end for i
00336       gradResults.resize(3*dof*numPts);
00337 
00338       double* tmpGradOutPtr = NULL;
00339       double* gradResultsPtr = NULL;
00340 
00341       if(!(tmpGradOut.empty())) {
00342         tmpGradOutPtr = (&(*(tmpGradOut.begin())));
00343       }
00344 
00345       if(!(gradResults.empty())) {
00346         gradResultsPtr = (&(*(gradResults.begin())));
00347       }
00348 
00349       par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<double >( tmpGradOutPtr, recvCnts, recvDisps,
00350           gradResultsPtr, sendCnts, sendDisps, comm);
00351       tmpGradOut.clear();
00352     }
00353 
00354     assert(sendCnts);
00355     delete [] sendCnts;

00357 
00358     assert(sendDisps);

00369 
00370     //Use commMap and re-order the results in the same order as the original
00371     //points
00372     PetscInt outSz;
00373     VecGetLocalSize(out, &outSz);
00374     assert(outSz == (dof*numPts));
00375 
00376     PetscScalar* outArr;
00377     VecGetArray(out, &outArr);
00378     for(int i = 0; i < numPts; i++) {
00379       for(int j = 0; j < dof; j++) {
00380         outArr[(dof*commMap[i]) + j] = results[(dof*i) + j];
00381       }//end for j
00382     }//end for i
00383     VecRestoreArray(out, &outArr);
00384 
00385     if(computeGradient) {
00386       PetscInt gradOutSz;
00387       assert(gradOut != NULL);
00388       VecGetLocalSize((*gradOut), &gradOutSz);
00389       assert(gradOutSz == (3*dof*numPts));
00390       PetscScalar* gradOutArr;
00391       VecGetArray((*gradOut), &gradOutArr);
00392       for(int i = 0; i < numPts; i++) {
00393         for(int j = 0; j < (3*dof); j++) {
00394           gradOutArr[(3*dof*commMap[i]) + j] = gradResults[(3*dof*i) + j];
00395         }//end for j
00396       }//end for i
00397       VecRestoreArray((*gradOut), &gradOutArr);
00398     }
00399 
00400     if(commMap) {
00401       delete [] commMap;
00402       commMap = NULL;
00403     }
00404 
00405   }

00570           (ptsCtr < localList.size()); da->next<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>()) {
00571 
00572         Point pt = da->getCurrentOffset();
00573         unsigned int currLev = da->getLevel(da->curr());
00574 
00575         ot::TreeNode currOct(pt.xint(), pt.yint(), pt.zint(), currLev, 3, maxDepth);
00576 
00577         unsigned int indices[8];
00578         da->getNodeIndices(indices);
00579 
00580         unsigned char childNum = da->getChildNumber();
00581         unsigned char hnMask = da->getHangingNodeIndex(da->curr());
00582         unsigned char elemType = 0;
00583         GET_ETYPE_BLOCK(elemType, hnMask, childNum)
00584 
00585           double x0 = (pt.x())*hxFac;
00586         double y0 = (pt.y())*hxFac;
00587         double z0 = (pt.z())*hxFac;
00588         double hxOct = (static_cast<double>(1u << (maxDepth - currLev)))*hxFac;
00589 
00590         //All the recieved points lie within some octant or the other.
00591         //So the ptsCtr will be incremented properly inside this loop.
00592         //Evaluate at all points within this octant
00593         while( (ptsCtr < localList.size()) &&
00594             ( (currOct == ((localList[ptsCtr].value)->node)) ||
00595               (currOct.isAncestor(((localList[ptsCtr].value)->node))) ) ) {
00596 
00597           double px = ((localList[ptsCtr].value)->values)[0];
00598           double py = ((localList[ptsCtr].value)->values)[1];
00599           double pz = ((localList[ptsCtr].value)->values)[2];
00600           double xloc =  (2.0*(px - x0)/hxOct) - 1.0;
00601           double yloc =  (2.0*(py - y0)/hxOct) - 1.0;
00602           double zloc =  (2.0*(pz - z0)/hxOct) - 1.0;
00603 
00604           double ShFnVals[8];
00605           for(int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00606             ShFnVals[j] = ( ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][0] + 
00607                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][1]*xloc) +
00608                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][2]*yloc) +
00609                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][3]*zloc) +
00610                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][4]*xloc*yloc) +
00611                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][5]*yloc*zloc) +
00612                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][6]*zloc*xloc) +
00613                 (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][7]*xloc*yloc*zloc) );
00614           }//end for j
00615 
00616           unsigned int outIdx = localList[ptsCtr].index;
00617 
00618           for(int k = 0; k < dof; k++) {
00619             tmpOut[(dof*outIdx) + k] = 0.0;
00620             for(int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00621               tmpOut[(dof*outIdx) + k] += (inArr[(dof*indices[j]) + k]*ShFnVals[j]);
00622             }//end for j
00623           }//end for k
00624 
00625           if(computeGradient) {
00626 
00627             double GradShFnVals[8][3];
00628             for(int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00629               GradShFnVals[j][0] = ( ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][1] +
00630                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][4]*yloc) +
00631                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][6]*zloc) +
00632                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][7]*yloc*zloc) );
00633 
00634               GradShFnVals[j][1] = ( ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][2] +
00635                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][4]*xloc) +
00636                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][5]*zloc) +
00637                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][7]*xloc*zloc) );
00638 
00639               GradShFnVals[j][2] = ( ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][3] +
00640                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][5]*yloc) +
00641                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][6]*xloc) +
00642                   (ShapeFnCoeffs[childNum][elemType][j][7]*xloc*yloc) );            
00643             }//end for j
00644 
00645             double gradFac = (2.0/hxOct);
00646 
00647             for(int k = 0; k < dof; k++) {
00648               for(int l = 0; l < 3; l++) {
00649                 tmpGradOut[(3*dof*outIdx) + (3*k) + l] = 0.0;
00650                 for(int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00651                   tmpGradOut[(3*dof*outIdx) + (3*k) + l] += (inArr[(dof*indices[j]) + k]*GradShFnVals[j][l]);
00652                 }//end for j
00653                 tmpGradOut[(3*dof*outIdx) + (3*k) + l] *= gradFac;
00654               }//end for l
00655             }//end for k
00656 
00657           }//end if need grad
00658 
00659           ptsCtr++;
00660         }//end while
00661 
00662       }//end writable loop
00663     } else {
00664       assert(localList.empty());
00665     }//end if active
00666 
00667     da->vecRestoreBuffer<double>(in, inArr, false, false, true, dof);
00668 
00669     recvList.clear();
00670     localList.clear();
00671 
00672     //Return the results. This communication is the exact reverse of the earlier
00673     //communication.
00674 
00675     std::vector<double> results(dof*numPts);
00676     for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00677       sendCnts[i] *= dof;
00678       sendDisps[i] *= dof;
00679       recvCnts[i] *= dof;
00680       recvDisps[i] *= dof;
00681     }//end for i
00682 
00683     double* tmpOutPtr = NULL;
00684     double* resultsPtr = NULL;
00685 
00686     if(!(tmpOut.empty())) {
00687       tmpOutPtr = (&(*(tmpOut.begin())));
00688     }
00689 
00690     if(!(results.empty())) {
00691       resultsPtr = (&(*(results.begin())));
00692     }
00693 
00694     par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<double >( tmpOutPtr, recvCnts, recvDisps,
00695         resultsPtr, sendCnts, sendDisps, comm);
00696     tmpOut.clear();
00697 
00698     std::vector<double> gradResults;
00699     if(computeGradient) {
00700       for(int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
00701         sendCnts[i] *= 3;
00702         sendDisps[i] *= 3;
00703         recvCnts[i] *= 3;
00704         recvDisps[i] *= 3;
00705       }//end for i
00706       gradResults.resize(3*dof*numPts);
00707 
00708       double* tmpGradOutPtr = NULL;
00709       double* gradResultsPtr = NULL;
00710 
00711       if(!(tmpGradOut.empty())) {
00712         tmpGradOutPtr = (&(*(tmpGradOut.begin())));
00713       }
00714 
00715       if(!(gradResults.empty())) {
00716         gradResultsPtr = (&(*(gradResults.begin())));
00717       }
00718 
00719       par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<double >( tmpGradOutPtr, recvCnts, recvDisps,
00720           gradResultsPtr, sendCnts, sendDisps, comm);
00721       tmpGradOut.clear();
00722     }
00723 
00724     assert(sendCnts);
00725     delete [] sendCnts;
00726     sendCnts = NULL;
00727 
00728     assert(sendDisps);
00729     delete [] sendDisps;
00730     sendDisps = NULL;
00731 
00732     assert(recvCnts);
00733     delete [] recvCnts;
00734     recvCnts = NULL;
00735 
00736     assert(recvDisps);
00737     delete [] recvDisps;
00738     recvDisps = NULL;
00739 
00740     //Use commMap and re-order the results in the same order as the original
00741     //points
00742     out.resize(dof*numPts);
00743     for(int i = 0; i < numPts; i++) {
00744       for(int j = 0; j < dof; j++) {
00745         out[(dof*commMap[i]) + j] = results[(dof*i) + j];
00746       }//end for j
00747     }//end for i
00748 
00749     if(computeGradient) {
00750       gradOut->resize(3*dof*numPts);
00751       for(int i = 0; i < numPts; i++) {
00752         for(int j = 0; j < 3*dof; j++) {
00753           (*gradOut)[(3*dof*commMap[i]) + j] = gradResults[(3*dof*i) + j];
00754         }//end for j
00755       }//end for i
00756     }
00757 
00758     if(commMap) {
00759       delete [] commMap;
00760       commMap = NULL;
00761     }
00762 
00763   }//end function
00764 
00765   void writePartitionVTK(ot::DA* da, const char* outFileName) {
00766     int rank = da->getRankAll();
00767     //Only processor writes
00768     if(!rank) {
00769       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> minBlocks = da->getMinAllBlocks();
00770       unsigned int maxDepth = da->getMaxDepth();
00771       ot::TreeNode root(3, maxDepth);
00772       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> allBlocks;
00773       ot::completeSubtree(root, minBlocks, allBlocks, 3, maxDepth, true, true);
00774 
00775       FILE* outfile = fopen(outFileName,"w");
00776 
00777       //Set the weights of allBlocks to be the processor ids. 
00778       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < allBlocks.size(); i++) {
00779         unsigned int pId;
00780         bool found = seq::maxLowerBound<ot::TreeNode>(minBlocks, allBlocks[i], pId, NULL, NULL);
00781         assert(found);
00782         allBlocks[i].setWeight(pId);
00783       }
00784 
00785       unsigned int numNode = static_cast<unsigned int>(allBlocks.size());
00786 
00787       float coord[8][3] = {
00788         {0.0,0.0,0.0},
00789         {1.0,0.0,0.0},
00790         {0.0,1.0,0.0},
00791         {1.0,1.0,0.0},
00792         {0.0,0.0,1.0},
00793         {1.0,0.0,1.0},
00794         {0.0,1.0,1.0},
00795         {1.0,1.0,1.0}
00796       };
00797 
00798       fprintf(outfile,"# vtk DataFile Version 3.0\n");
00799       fprintf(outfile,"Octree field file\n");
00800       fprintf(outfile,"ASCII\n");
00801       fprintf(outfile,"DATASET UNSTRUCTURED_GRID\n");
00802       fprintf(outfile,"POINTS %d float\n",(numNode*8));
00803 
00804       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numNode; i++) {
00805         unsigned int x = allBlocks[i].getX();
00806         unsigned int y = allBlocks[i].getY(); 
00807         unsigned int z = allBlocks[i].getZ();
00808         unsigned int d = allBlocks[i].getLevel();
00809         float fx, fy, fz,hx;
00810         fx = ((float)x)/((float)(1u<<maxDepth));
00811         fy = ((float)y)/((float)(1u<<maxDepth));
00812         fz = ((float)z)/((float)(1u<<maxDepth));
00813         hx = ((float)(1u<<(maxDepth-d)))/((float)(1u<<maxDepth));
00814 
00815         for(int j = 0; j < 8; j++)
00816         {
00817           float fxn,fyn,fzn;
00818           fxn = fx + coord[j][0]*hx;
00819           fyn = fy + coord[j][1]*hx;
00820           fzn = fz + coord[j][2]*hx;
00821           fprintf(outfile,"%f %f %f \n",fxn,fyn,fzn);
00822         }
00823       }
00824 
00825       fprintf(outfile,"\nCELLS %d %d\n",numNode,numNode*9);
00826 
00827       for(int i = 0; i < numNode; i++)
00828       {
00829         fprintf(outfile,"8 ");
00830 
00831         for(int j = 0; j < 8; j++)
00832         {
00833           int index = (8*i)+j;
00834           fprintf(outfile,"%d ",index);
00835         }
00836         fprintf(outfile,"\n");
00837       }
00838 
00839       fprintf(outfile,"\nCELL_TYPES %d\n",numNode);
00840 
00841       for(int i = 0; i < numNode; i++)
00842       {
00843         fprintf(outfile,"11 \n");
00844       }
00845 
00846       fprintf(outfile,"\nCELL_DATA %d\n",numNode);
00847       fprintf(outfile,"SCALARS scalars unsigned_int\n");
00848       fprintf(outfile,"LOOKUP_TABLE default\n");
00849 
00850       for (unsigned int i =0; i< numNode; i++) {
00851         unsigned int v = allBlocks[i].getWeight();
00852         fprintf(outfile,"%u \n", v);
00853       }
00854 
00855       fclose(outfile);
00856 
00857     }//end if p0
00858   }//end function
00859 
00860   unsigned int getGlobalMinLevel(ot::DA* da) {
00861 
00862     unsigned int myMinLev = ot::TreeNode::MAX_LEVEL;
00863     unsigned int globalMinLev;
00864 
00865     //It is sufficient to loop over the elements, since boundaries were added at the same level as some element. 
00866     if(da->iAmActive()) {
00867       for(da->init<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>();
00868           da->curr() < da->end<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>();
00869           da->next<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>())  
00870       {
00871         unsigned int currLevel = da->getLevel(da->curr());
00872         if(currLevel < myMinLev) {
00873           myMinLev = currLevel;
00874         }
00875       }      
00876     }
00877 
00878     par::Mpi_Allreduce<unsigned int>(&myMinLev, &globalMinLev, 1, MPI_MIN, da->getComm() );
00879 
00880     //The initial octree is not root. So the min lev in the initial octree is atleast 1. So in the embedded octree the minlev is atleast 2. 
00881     assert(globalMinLev > 1);
00882 
00883     //Return the result in the original octree configuration
00884     return (globalMinLev -1);
00885   }
00886 
00887   unsigned int getGlobalMaxLevel(ot::DA* da) {
00888 
00889     unsigned int myMaxLev = 0;
00890     unsigned int globalMaxLev;
00891 
00892     //It is sufficient to loop over the elements, since boundaries were added at the same level as some element. 
00893     if( da->iAmActive() ) {
00894       for(da->init<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>(); 
00895           da->curr() < da->end<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>();
00896           da->next<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>())  
00897       {
00898         unsigned int currLevel = da->getLevel(da->curr());
00899         if(currLevel > myMaxLev) {
00900           myMaxLev = currLevel;
00901         }
00902       }      
00903     }
00904 
00905     par::Mpi_Allreduce<unsigned int>(&myMaxLev, &globalMaxLev, 1, MPI_MAX, da->getComm() );
00906 
00907     //m_uiMaxDepth will be 0 on inActive processors.
00908     if(da->iAmActive()) {
00909       assert(globalMaxLev <= da->getMaxDepth() );
00910     }else {
00911       assert(globalMaxLev <= ot::TreeNode::MAX_LEVEL);
00912     }
00913 
00914     //Return the result in the original octree configuration
00915     return (globalMaxLev -1);   
00916   }
00917 
00918   unsigned int getSortOrder(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, 
00919       unsigned int z, unsigned int sz) {
00920 
00921     // first compare the x, y, and z to determine which one dominates ...
00922     unsigned int _x = x^(x+sz);
00923     unsigned int _y = y^(y+sz);
00924     unsigned int _z = z^(z+sz);
00925 
00926     // compute order ...
00927     if (_x > _y) {
00928       if ( _y > _z) {
00929         return ot::DA_FLAGS::ZYX;
00930       } else if ( _x > _z ) {
00931         return ot::DA_FLAGS::YZX;
00932       } else {
00933         return ot::DA_FLAGS::YXZ;
00934       }
00935     } else {
00936       if ( _y > _z) {
00937         return ot::DA_FLAGS::ZXY;
00938       } else if ( _x > _z ) {
00939         return ot::DA_FLAGS::ZXY;
00940       } else {
00941         return ot::DA_FLAGS::XYZ;
00942       }
00943     }
00944   }
00945 
00946   unsigned char getTouchConfig(const ot::TreeNode& curr, 
00947       const ot::TreeNode& next, unsigned int maxDepth) {
00948     unsigned char c = 0;
00949     unsigned int cx = curr.minX();
00950     unsigned int cy = curr.minY();
00951     unsigned int cz = curr.minZ();
00952     unsigned int nx = next.minX();
00953     unsigned int ny = next.minY();
00954     unsigned int nz = next.minZ();
00955     unsigned int cd = curr.getLevel();
00956     unsigned int nd = next.getLevel();
00957     unsigned int cs = (1u<<(maxDepth - cd));
00958     unsigned int ns = (1u<<(maxDepth - nd));
00959 
00960     //_zzyyxxT  
00961     bool isTouchingX = false;
00962     bool isTouchingY = false;
00963     bool isTouchingZ = false;
00964 
00965     if (cx == nx) {
00966       isTouchingX = true;
00967     }
00968 
00969     if (cx == (nx + ns) ) {
00970       isTouchingX = true;
00971       c += (1 << 1);
00972     }
00973 
00974     if ( (cx + cs) == nx ) {
00975       isTouchingX = true;
00976       c += (2 << 1);
00977     }
00978 
00979     if ( (cx + cs) == (nx + ns) ) {
00980       isTouchingX = true;
00981       c += (3 << 1);
00982     }
00983 
00984     if (cy == ny) {
00985       isTouchingY = true;
00986     }
00987 
00988     if (cy == (ny + ns) ) {
00989       isTouchingY = true;
00990       c += (1 << 3);
00991     }
00992 
00993     if ( (cy + cs) == ny ) {
00994       isTouchingY = true;
00995       c += (2 << 3);
00996     }
00997 
00998     if ( (cy + cs) == (ny + ns) ) {
00999       isTouchingY = true;
01000       c += (3 << 3);
01001     }
01002 
01003     if (cz == nz) {
01004       isTouchingZ = true;
01005     }
01006 
01007     if (cz == (nz + ns) ) {
01008       isTouchingZ = true;
01009       c += (1 << 5);
01010     }
01011 
01012     if ( (cz + cs) == nz ) {
01013       isTouchingZ = true;
01014       c += (2<<5);
01015     }
01016 
01017     if ( (cz + cs) == (nz + ns) ) {
01018       isTouchingZ = true;
01019       c += (3<<5);
01020     }
01021 
01022     if ( isTouchingX && isTouchingY && isTouchingZ ) {
01023       c += 1;
01024     } else {
01025       c = 0;
01026     }
01027 
01028     return c;
01029   }
01030 
01031   bool isRegularGrid(ot::DA* da) {
01032     int iHaveHanging = 0;
01033     if(da->iAmActive()) {
01034       for(da->init<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>(); 
01035           da->curr() < da->end<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>();
01036           da->next<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>()) { 
01037         if(da->isHanging(da->curr())) {
01038           iHaveHanging = 1;
01039           std::cout<<(da->getRankActive())<<
01040             " found a hanging node for element with id: "
01041             <<(da->curr())<<std::endl;
01042 
01043           break;
01044         }
01045       }//end for writable
01046     }//end if active
01047 
01048     int anyOneHasHanging;
01049     par::Mpi_Allreduce<int>(&iHaveHanging, &anyOneHasHanging, 1, MPI_SUM, da->getComm());
01050 
01051     return (!anyOneHasHanging);
01052   }//end function
01053 
01054   void assignBoundaryFlags(ot::DA* da, 
01055       std::vector<unsigned char> & bdyFlagVec) {
01056 
01057     da->createVector(bdyFlagVec, false, false, 1);//Nodal, Non-ghosted, single dof
01058 
01059     for(int i = 0; i < bdyFlagVec.size(); i++) {
01060       bdyFlagVec[i] = 0;
01061     }//initialization loop
01062 
01063     unsigned char *bdyFlagArr = NULL;
01064     da->vecGetBuffer<unsigned char>(bdyFlagVec,bdyFlagArr,
01065         false,false,false,1);
01066 
01067     if(da->iAmActive()) {
01068       //We can only loop over the elements, hence the positive boundary elements
01069       //will add the flags for the external positive boundary nodes.
01070       for(da->init<ot::DA_FLAGS::ALL>(); 
01071           da->curr() < da->end<ot::DA_FLAGS::ALL>();
01072           da->next<ot::DA_FLAGS::ALL>()) { 
01073         unsigned char currentFlags;
01074         bool calledGetNodeIndices = false;
01075         if(da->isBoundaryOctant(&currentFlags)) {
01076           //The status of the anchor of any real octant is determined by the
01077           //negative face boundaries only
01078           int xNegBdy = (currentFlags & ot::TreeNode::X_NEG_BDY);
01079           int yNegBdy = (currentFlags & ot::TreeNode::Y_NEG_BDY);
01080           int zNegBdy = (currentFlags & ot::TreeNode::Z_NEG_BDY);
01081 
01082           unsigned char hnMask = da->getHangingNodeIndex(da->curr());
01083           if(!(hnMask & 1)) {
01084             //Anchor is not hanging                 
01085             if(xNegBdy) {
01086               if(yNegBdy && zNegBdy){
01087                 bdyFlagArr[da->curr()] = ot::TreeNode::CORNER_BDY;
01088               }else if(yNegBdy || zNegBdy) {
01089                 bdyFlagArr[da->curr()] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01090               }else {
01091                 bdyFlagArr[da->curr()] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01092               }
01093             }else if(yNegBdy) {
01094               if(zNegBdy) {
01095                 bdyFlagArr[da->curr()] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01096               }else {
01097                 bdyFlagArr[da->curr()] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01098               }
01099             }else if(zNegBdy) {
01100               bdyFlagArr[da->curr()] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01101             }
01102           }//end if anchor hanging
01103 
01104           if(currentFlags > ot::TreeNode::NEG_POS_DEMARCATION) {
01105             //Has at least one positive boundary
01106             //May have negative boundaries as well
01107             unsigned int indices[8];
01108             da->getNodeIndices(indices); 
01109             calledGetNodeIndices = true;
01110             int xPosBdy = (currentFlags & ot::TreeNode::X_POS_BDY);
01111             int yPosBdy = (currentFlags & ot::TreeNode::Y_POS_BDY);
01112             int zPosBdy = (currentFlags & ot::TreeNode::Z_POS_BDY);
01113 
01114             if(!(hnMask & (1 << 1))) {
01115               bool xBdy = xPosBdy;
01116               bool yBdy = yNegBdy;
01117               bool zBdy = zNegBdy;
01118               if(xBdy) {
01119                 if(yBdy && zBdy){
01120                   bdyFlagArr[indices[1]] = ot::TreeNode::CORNER_BDY;
01121                 }else if(yBdy || zBdy) {
01122                   bdyFlagArr[indices[1]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01123                 }else {
01124                   bdyFlagArr[indices[1]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01125                 }
01126               }else if(yBdy) {
01127                 if(zBdy) {
01128                   bdyFlagArr[indices[1]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01129                 }else {
01130                   bdyFlagArr[indices[1]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01131                 }
01132               }else if(zBdy) {
01133                 bdyFlagArr[indices[1]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01134               }
01135             }
01136 
01137             if(!(hnMask & (1 << 2))) {
01138               bool xBdy = xNegBdy;
01139               bool yBdy = yPosBdy;
01140               bool zBdy = zNegBdy;
01141               if(xBdy) {
01142                 if(yBdy && zBdy){
01143                   bdyFlagArr[indices[2]] = ot::TreeNode::CORNER_BDY;
01144                 }else if(yBdy || zBdy) {
01145                   bdyFlagArr[indices[2]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01146                 }else {
01147                   bdyFlagArr[indices[2]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01148                 }
01149               }else if(yBdy) {
01150                 if(zBdy) {
01151                   bdyFlagArr[indices[2]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01152                 }else {
01153                   bdyFlagArr[indices[2]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01154                 }
01155               }else if(zBdy) {
01156                 bdyFlagArr[indices[2]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01157               }
01158             }
01159 
01160             if(!(hnMask & (1 << 3))) {
01161               bool xBdy = xPosBdy;
01162               bool yBdy = yPosBdy;
01163               bool zBdy = zNegBdy;
01164               if(xBdy) {
01165                 if(yBdy && zBdy){
01166                   bdyFlagArr[indices[3]] = ot::TreeNode::CORNER_BDY;
01167                 }else if(yBdy || zBdy) {
01168                   bdyFlagArr[indices[3]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01169                 }else {
01170                   bdyFlagArr[indices[3]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01171                 }
01172               }else if(yBdy) {
01173                 if(zBdy) {
01174                   bdyFlagArr[indices[3]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01175                 }else {
01176                   bdyFlagArr[indices[3]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01177                 }
01178               }else if(zBdy) {
01179                 bdyFlagArr[indices[3]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01180               }
01181             }
01182 
01183             if(!(hnMask & (1 << 4))) {
01184               bool xBdy = xNegBdy;
01185               bool yBdy = yNegBdy;
01186               bool zBdy = zPosBdy;
01187               if(xBdy) {
01188                 if(yBdy && zBdy){
01189                   bdyFlagArr[indices[4]] = ot::TreeNode::CORNER_BDY;
01190                 }else if(yBdy || zBdy) {
01191                   bdyFlagArr[indices[4]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01192                 }else {
01193                   bdyFlagArr[indices[4]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01194                 }
01195               }else if(yBdy) {
01196                 if(zBdy) {
01197                   bdyFlagArr[indices[4]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01198                 }else {
01199                   bdyFlagArr[indices[4]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01200                 }
01201               }else if(zBdy) {
01202                 bdyFlagArr[indices[4]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01203               }
01204             }
01205 
01206             if(!(hnMask & (1 << 5))) {
01207               bool xBdy = xPosBdy;
01208               bool yBdy = yNegBdy;
01209               bool zBdy = zPosBdy;
01210               if(xBdy) {
01211                 if(yBdy && zBdy){
01212                   bdyFlagArr[indices[5]] = ot::TreeNode::CORNER_BDY;
01213                 }else if(yBdy || zBdy) {
01214                   bdyFlagArr[indices[5]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01215                 }else {
01216                   bdyFlagArr[indices[5]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01217                 }
01218               }else if(yBdy) {
01219                 if(zBdy) {
01220                   bdyFlagArr[indices[5]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01221                 }else {
01222                   bdyFlagArr[indices[5]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01223                 }
01224               }else if(zBdy) {
01225                 bdyFlagArr[indices[5]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01226               }
01227             }
01228 
01229             if(!(hnMask & (1 << 6))) {
01230               bool xBdy = xNegBdy;
01231               bool yBdy = yPosBdy;
01232               bool zBdy = zPosBdy;
01233               if(xBdy) {
01234                 if(yBdy && zBdy){
01235                   bdyFlagArr[indices[6]] = ot::TreeNode::CORNER_BDY;
01236                 }else if(yBdy || zBdy) {
01237                   bdyFlagArr[indices[6]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01238                 }else {
01239                   bdyFlagArr[indices[6]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01240                 }
01241               }else if(yBdy) {
01242                 if(zBdy) {
01243                   bdyFlagArr[indices[6]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01244                 }else {
01245                   bdyFlagArr[indices[6]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01246                 }
01247               }else if(zBdy) {
01248                 bdyFlagArr[indices[6]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01249               }
01250             }
01251 
01252             if(!(hnMask & (1 << 7))) {
01253               bool xBdy = xPosBdy;
01254               bool yBdy = yPosBdy;
01255               bool zBdy = zPosBdy;
01256               if(xBdy) {
01257                 if(yBdy && zBdy){
01258                   bdyFlagArr[indices[7]] = ot::TreeNode::CORNER_BDY;
01259                 }else if(yBdy || zBdy) {
01260                   bdyFlagArr[indices[7]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01261                 }else {
01262                   bdyFlagArr[indices[7]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01263                 }
01264               }else if(yBdy) {
01265                 if(zBdy) {
01266                   bdyFlagArr[indices[7]] = ot::TreeNode::EDGE_BDY;
01267                 }else {
01268                   bdyFlagArr[indices[7]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01269                 }
01270               }else if(zBdy) {
01271                 bdyFlagArr[indices[7]] = ot::TreeNode::FACE_BDY;
01272               }
01273             }
01274           }//end if-else has positive boundaries
01275         }//end if boundary
01276         if( (!calledGetNodeIndices) && (da->isLUTcompressed()) ) {
01277           da->updateQuotientCounter();
01278         }
01279       }//end for all own elements
01280     }//end if active
01281 
01282     da->vecRestoreBuffer<unsigned char>(bdyFlagVec,bdyFlagArr,false,false,false,1);
01283   }//end function
01284 
01285   void includeSiblingsOfBoundary(std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& allBoundaryLeaves, 
01286       const ot::TreeNode& myFirstOctant, const ot::TreeNode& myLastOctant) {
01287     PROF_ADD_BDY_SIBLINGS_BEGIN
01288 
01289       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpAllBoundaryLeaves;
01290 
01291     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < allBoundaryLeaves.size(); i++) {
01292       ot::TreeNode thisOct = allBoundaryLeaves[i];
01293       ot::TreeNode thisOctParent = thisOct.getParent();
01294       unsigned int thisCnum = ((unsigned int)(thisOct.getChildNumber()));
01295       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> siblingsToAdd;
01296       thisOctParent.addChildren(siblingsToAdd);
01297       for(unsigned int j=0; j < 8; j++) {
01298         if( (j != thisCnum) && (j != (7-thisCnum)) ) {
01299           if( (siblingsToAdd[j] >= myFirstOctant) && 
01300               (siblingsToAdd[j] <= myLastOctant) ) {
01301             tmpAllBoundaryLeaves.push_back(siblingsToAdd[j]);
01302           }
01303         }
01304       }   
01305     }//end for i
01306 
01307     seq::makeVectorUnique<ot::TreeNode>(tmpAllBoundaryLeaves,false);
01308 
01309     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmp2Vec;
01310 
01311     unsigned int tmpCnt = 0;
01312     unsigned int bdyCnt = 0;
01313 
01314     //The two lists are independently sorted and unique, Now we do a linear
01315     //pass and merge them so that the result is also sorted and unique.
01316 
01317     while ( (tmpCnt < tmpAllBoundaryLeaves.size()) &&
01318         (bdyCnt < allBoundaryLeaves.size()) ) {
01319       if ( tmpAllBoundaryLeaves[tmpCnt] < allBoundaryLeaves[bdyCnt] ) {
01320         tmp2Vec.push_back(tmpAllBoundaryLeaves[tmpCnt]);
01321         tmpCnt++;
01322       }else if( tmpAllBoundaryLeaves[tmpCnt] > allBoundaryLeaves[bdyCnt] ) {
01323         tmp2Vec.push_back(allBoundaryLeaves[bdyCnt]);
01324         bdyCnt++;
01325       }else {
01326         tmp2Vec.push_back(allBoundaryLeaves[bdyCnt]);
01327         bdyCnt++;
01328         tmpCnt++; //tmpCnt must also be incremented to preserve uniqueness.
01329       }
01330     }
01331 
01332     while (bdyCnt < allBoundaryLeaves.size()) {
01333       tmp2Vec.push_back(allBoundaryLeaves[bdyCnt]);
01334       bdyCnt++;
01335     }
01336 
01337     while (tmpCnt < tmpAllBoundaryLeaves.size()) {
01338       tmp2Vec.push_back(tmpAllBoundaryLeaves[tmpCnt]);
01339       tmpCnt++;
01340     }
01341 
01342     allBoundaryLeaves = tmp2Vec;
01343 
01344     tmp2Vec.clear();
01345     tmpAllBoundaryLeaves.clear();
01346 
01347     PROF_ADD_BDY_SIBLINGS_END
01348   }//end function
01349 
01350   void prepareAprioriCommMessagesInDAtype1(const std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& in,
01351       std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& allBoundaryLeaves, std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& blocks,
01352       const std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& allBlocks, int myRank, int npes, int* sendCnt,
01353       std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> >& sendNodes) {
01354     PROF_DA_APRIORI_COMM_BEGIN
01355 
01356       std::vector<unsigned int> bdy2elem;
01357 
01358     unsigned int bdyCnt = 0;
01359     unsigned int allCnt = 0;
01360 
01361     while (bdyCnt < allBoundaryLeaves.size()) {
01362       if ( allBoundaryLeaves[bdyCnt] < in[allCnt]) {
01363         bdyCnt++;
01364       } else if ( allBoundaryLeaves[bdyCnt] > in[allCnt]) {
01365         allCnt++;
01366       } else {
01367         //Both are equal.               
01368         bdy2elem.push_back(allCnt);
01369         bdyCnt++;
01370       }
01371     }
01372 
01373     //This step is necessary because some elements of allBoundaryLeaves were not
01374     //copied from the "in" vector, instead we generated them directly. So these
01375     //octants will not have correct flags set. So we find the corresponding copy
01376     //in the "in" vector.  
01377     allBoundaryLeaves.clear();
01378     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < bdy2elem.size(); i++) {
01379       allBoundaryLeaves.push_back(in[bdy2elem[i]]);
01380     }
01381 
01382     // 3. Reduce the list of global blocks to a smaller list that only has the
01383     // blocks which neighbour ones own blocks.
01384 
01385     //First mark your own blocks as being singular or not.
01386     unsigned int allBdyCnt = 0;
01387     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < blocks.size(); i++) {
01388       while( (allBdyCnt < allBoundaryLeaves.size()) &&
01389           (allBoundaryLeaves[allBdyCnt] < blocks[i]) ) {
01390         allBdyCnt++;
01391       }
01392       //Note, even if a block is Singular but is
01393       //not a ghost candidates (i.e., it is completely internal).
01394       // It will be treated as being NOT singular.
01395       bool isSingular = false;
01396       if( (allBdyCnt < allBoundaryLeaves.size()) &&
01397           (allBoundaryLeaves[allBdyCnt] == blocks[i]) ) {
01398         isSingular = true;
01399       }
01400       if(isSingular) {
01401         blocks[i].setWeight(1);
01402       }else {
01403         blocks[i].setWeight(0);
01404       }
01405     }
01406 
01407     std::vector<ot::TreeNode> myNhBlocks;
01408     for (int j = 0; j < blocks.size(); j++) {
01409       unsigned int myMaxX;
01410       unsigned int myMaxY;
01411       unsigned int myMaxZ;
01412       unsigned int myMinX;
01413       unsigned int myMinY;
01414       unsigned int myMinZ;
01415       if(blocks[j].getWeight()) {
01416         //Since the subsequent selection is done based on the octant's parent's
01417         //neighbours, Singular blocks must be handled differently.
01418         myMaxX = blocks[j].getParent().maxX();
01419         myMaxY = blocks[j].getParent().maxY();
01420         myMaxZ = blocks[j].getParent().maxZ();
01421         myMinX = blocks[j].getParent().minX();
01422         myMinY = blocks[j].getParent().minY();
01423         myMinZ = blocks[j].getParent().minZ();
01424       }else {
01425         myMaxX = blocks[j].maxX();
01426         myMaxY = blocks[j].maxY();
01427         myMaxZ = blocks[j].maxZ();
01428         myMinX = blocks[j].minX();
01429         myMinY = blocks[j].minY();
01430         myMinZ = blocks[j].minZ();
01431       }
01432       double myLenX = (double)(myMaxX-myMinX);
01433       double myLenY = (double)(myMaxY-myMinY);
01434       double myLenZ = (double)(myMaxZ-myMinZ);
01435       double myXc  = ((double)(myMinX + myMaxX))/2.0;
01436       double myYc  = ((double)(myMinY + myMaxY))/2.0;
01437       double myZc  = ((double)(myMinZ + myMaxZ))/2.0;
01438       for (int k = 0; k < allBlocks.size(); k++) {
01439         if ( (allBlocks[k] >= blocks[0]) && 
01440             (allBlocks[k] <= blocks[blocks.size()-1]) ) {
01441           //ignore my own blocks
01442           continue;
01443         }
01444         unsigned int hisMinX = allBlocks[k].minX();
01445         unsigned int hisMaxX = allBlocks[k].maxX();
01446         unsigned int hisMinY = allBlocks[k].minY();
01447         unsigned int hisMaxY = allBlocks[k].maxY();
01448         unsigned int hisMinZ = allBlocks[k].minZ();
01449         unsigned int hisMaxZ = allBlocks[k].maxZ();
01450         double hisLenX = (double)(hisMaxX-hisMinX);
01451         double hisLenY = (double)(hisMaxY-hisMinY);
01452         double hisLenZ = (double)(hisMaxZ-hisMinZ);
01453         double hisXc  = ((double)(hisMinX + hisMaxX))/2.0;
01454         double hisYc  = ((double)(hisMinY + hisMaxY))/2.0;
01455         double hisZc  = ((double)(hisMinZ + hisMaxZ))/2.0;
01456         double deltaX = ( (hisXc > myXc) ? (hisXc - myXc) : (myXc - hisXc ) );
01457         double deltaY = ( (hisYc > myYc) ? (hisYc - myYc) : (myYc - hisYc ) );
01458         double deltaZ = ( (hisZc > myZc) ? (hisZc - myZc) : (myZc - hisZc ) );
01459 
01460         //Note: This test will pass if the octants intersect (say one is an
01461         //ancestor of another) or they simply touch externally.
01462 
01463         if ((deltaX <= ((hisLenX+myLenX)/2.0)) &&
01464             (deltaY <= ((hisLenY+myLenY)/2.0)) &&
01465             (deltaZ <= ((hisLenZ+myLenZ)/2.0))) {
01466           //We touch
01467           myNhBlocks.push_back(allBlocks[k]);
01468         }//end if
01469       }//end for k
01470     }//end for j
01471 
01472     //This also sorts myNhBlocks
01473     seq::makeVectorUnique<ot::TreeNode>(myNhBlocks,false);
01474 
01475     sendNodes.resize(npes);
01476     for (int i=0; i < npes; i++) {
01477       sendNodes[i].clear();
01478       sendCnt[i] = 0;
01479     } 
01480 
01481     for (int j=0; j<allBoundaryLeaves.size(); j++) {
01482       //It is important to make the selection using the parent. This tackles
01483       //the cases where some nodes of an octant are hanging and so even if the octant itself
01484       //does not touch a processor, its parent does and so the replacement for
01485       //the hanging node will be mapped to that processor. This also handles
01486       //the case where two or more siblings belong to different processors. By
01487       //making the test using the parent they will be sent to each other.
01488       //Moreover, some of the nodes of these children could be hanging and the
01489       //replacement could belong to a third processor. Even in this case, the
01490       //octants will be sent to the correct processors. 
01491 
01492       ot::TreeNode parNode = allBoundaryLeaves[j].getParent();
01493       unsigned int myMaxX = parNode.maxX();
01494       unsigned int myMaxY = parNode.maxY();
01495       unsigned int myMaxZ = parNode.maxZ();
01496       unsigned int myMinX = parNode.minX();
01497       unsigned int myMinY = parNode.minY();
01498       unsigned int myMinZ = parNode.minZ();
01499       double myLenX = (double)(myMaxX-myMinX);
01500       double myLenY = (double)(myMaxY-myMinY);
01501       double myLenZ = (double)(myMaxZ-myMinZ);
01502       double myXc  = ((double)(myMinX + myMaxX))/2.0;
01503       double myYc  = ((double)(myMinY + myMaxY))/2.0;
01504       double myZc  = ((double)(myMinZ + myMaxZ))/2.0;
01505       unsigned int lastP = npes;
01506       for (int k = 0; k < myNhBlocks.size(); k++) {
01507         if (myNhBlocks[k].getWeight() == lastP) {
01508           continue;
01509         }
01510         unsigned int hisMinX = myNhBlocks[k].minX();
01511         unsigned int hisMaxX = myNhBlocks[k].maxX();
01512         unsigned int hisMinY = myNhBlocks[k].minY();
01513         unsigned int hisMaxY = myNhBlocks[k].maxY();
01514         unsigned int hisMinZ = myNhBlocks[k].minZ();
01515         unsigned int hisMaxZ = myNhBlocks[k].maxZ();
01516         double hisLenX = (double)(hisMaxX-hisMinX);
01517         double hisLenY = (double)(hisMaxY-hisMinY);
01518         double hisLenZ = (double)(hisMaxZ-hisMinZ);
01519         double hisXc  = ((double)(hisMinX + hisMaxX))/2.0;
01520         double hisYc  = ((double)(hisMinY + hisMaxY))/2.0;
01521         double hisZc  = ((double)(hisMinZ + hisMaxZ))/2.0;
01522         double deltaX = ( (hisXc > myXc) ? (hisXc - myXc) : (myXc - hisXc ) );
01523         double deltaY = ( (hisYc > myYc) ? (hisYc - myYc) : (myYc - hisYc ) );
01524         double deltaZ = ( (hisZc > myZc) ? (hisZc - myZc) : (myZc - hisZc ) );
01525 
01526         //Note: This test will pass if the octants intersect (say one is an
01527         //ancestor of another) or they simply touch externally.
01528 
01529         if ((deltaX <= ((hisLenX+myLenX)/2.0)) &&
01530             (deltaY <= ((hisLenY+myLenY)/2.0)) &&
01531             (deltaZ <= ((hisLenZ+myLenZ)/2.0))) {
01532           //We touch
01533           sendNodes[myNhBlocks[k].getWeight()].push_back(bdy2elem[j]); 
01534           sendCnt[myNhBlocks[k].getWeight()]++;
01535           lastP = myNhBlocks[k].getWeight();
01536         }//end if
01537       }//end for k
01538     }//end for j
01539 
01540     PROF_DA_APRIORI_COMM_END
01541   }//end function
01542 
01543   void prepareAprioriCommMessagesInDAtype2(const std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& in,
01544       std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& allBoundaryLeaves, std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& blocks,
01545       const std::vector<ot::TreeNode>& minsOfBlocks, int myRank, int npes, int* sendCnt,
01546       std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int> >& sendNodes) {
01547     PROF_DA_APRIORI_COMM_BEGIN
01548 
01549       std::vector<unsigned int> bdy2elem;
01550 
01551     unsigned int bdyCnt = 0;
01552     unsigned int allCnt = 0;
01553     unsigned int maxDepth = in[0].getMaxDepth();
01554     unsigned int dim = in[0].getDim(); 
01555 
01556     while (bdyCnt < allBoundaryLeaves.size()) {
01557       if ( allBoundaryLeaves[bdyCnt] < in[allCnt]) {
01558         bdyCnt++;
01559       } else if ( allBoundaryLeaves[bdyCnt] > in[allCnt]) {
01560         allCnt++;
01561       } else {
01562         //Both are equal.               
01563         bdy2elem.push_back(allCnt);
01564         bdyCnt++;
01565       }
01566     }
01567 
01568     //This step is necessary because some elements of allBoundaryLeaves were not
01569     //copied from the "in" vector, instead we generated them directly. So these
01570     //octants will not have correct flags set. So we find the corresponding copy
01571     //in the "in" vector.  
01572     allBoundaryLeaves.clear();
01573     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < bdy2elem.size(); i++) {
01574       allBoundaryLeaves.push_back(in[bdy2elem[i]]);
01575     }
01576 
01577     sendNodes.resize(npes);
01578     for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
01579       sendNodes[i].clear();
01580       sendCnt[i] = 0;
01581     } 
01582 
01583     for (int j = 0; j < allBoundaryLeaves.size(); j++) {
01584       //It is important to make the selection using the parent. This tackles
01585       //the cases where some nodes of an octant are hanging and so even if the octant itself
01586       //does not touch a processor, its parent does and so the replacement for
01587       //the hanging node will be mapped to that processor. This also handles
01588       //the case where two or more siblings belong to different processors. By
01589       //making the test using the parent they will be sent to each other.
01590       //Moreover, some of the nodes of these children could be hanging and the
01591       //replacement could belong to a third processor. Even in this case, the
01592       //octants will be sent to the correct processors. 
01593 
01594       //1. We must not miss any pre-ghost elements that point to one of our own
01595       //octants, i.e. any pre-ghost element that we integrate over. This is
01596       //because we need to build the nlist for these octants as well.
01597       //2. We might get some extra ghosts they will be marked as FOREIGN and
01598       //will be ignored.
01599       //3. We must try to get as many post-ghost octants as possible to avoid
01600       //misses later and hence reduce subsequent communication. We should get
01601       //all direct post-ghost octants.
01602       //4. Post-ghosts are read-only and so it is sufficient to test for
01603       //post-ghost using its anchor
01604       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> myVertices;
01605       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> parVertices;
01606       std::vector<ot::TreeNode> anchorMirrors;
01607 
01608       unsigned int myX = allBoundaryLeaves[j].getX();
01609       unsigned int myY = allBoundaryLeaves[j].getY();
01610       unsigned int myZ = allBoundaryLeaves[j].getZ();
01611 
01612       //keys to check if you are a pre-ghost
01613       //Positive boundaries will not be pre-ghosts
01614       if(!(allBoundaryLeaves[j].getFlag() & ot::TreeNode::BOUNDARY)) {
01615         unsigned int myLev = allBoundaryLeaves[j].getLevel();
01616         unsigned int mySz = (1u<<(maxDepth - myLev));
01617 
01618         //All vertices except my anchor. Since my anchor belongs to my processor
01619         myVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode((myX + mySz), myY, myZ, maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01620         myVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode(myX, (myY + mySz), myZ, maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01621         myVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode((myX + mySz), (myY + mySz), myZ, maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01622         myVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode(myX, myY, (myZ + mySz), maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01623         myVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode((myX + mySz), myY, (myZ + mySz), maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01624         myVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode(myX, (myY + mySz), (myZ + mySz), maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01625         myVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode((myX + mySz), (myY + mySz), (myZ + mySz), maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01626 
01627         ot::TreeNode parNode = allBoundaryLeaves[j].getParent();
01628         unsigned int myCnum = allBoundaryLeaves[j].getChildNumber();
01629         unsigned int parX = parNode.getX();
01630         unsigned int parY = parNode.getY();
01631         unsigned int parZ = parNode.getZ();
01632         unsigned int parLev = parNode.getLevel();
01633         unsigned int parSz = (1u<<(maxDepth - parLev));
01634 
01635         //vertices numbers myCnum and (7 - myCnum) can't be hanging and so they
01636         //will not be mapped to the corresponding vertices of my parent
01637         if( (myCnum != 0) && (myCnum != 7) ) {
01638           parVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode(parX, parY, parZ, maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01639         }
01640         if( (myCnum != 1) && (myCnum != 6) ) {
01641           parVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode((parX + parSz), parY, parZ, maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01642         }
01643         if( (myCnum != 2) && (myCnum != 5) ) {
01644           parVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode(parX, (parY + parSz), parZ, maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01645         }
01646         if( (myCnum != 3) && (myCnum != 4) ) {
01647           parVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode((parX + parSz), (parY + parSz), parZ, maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01648         }
01649         if( (myCnum != 4) && (myCnum != 3) ) {
01650           parVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode(parX, parY, (parZ + parSz), maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01651         }
01652         if( (myCnum != 5) && (myCnum != 2) ) {
01653           parVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode((parX + parSz), parY, (parZ + parSz), maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01654         }
01655         if( (myCnum != 6) && (myCnum != 1) ) {
01656           parVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode(parX, (parY + parSz), (parZ + parSz), maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01657         }
01658         if( (myCnum != 7) && (myCnum != 0) ) {
01659           parVertices.push_back(ot::TreeNode((parX + parSz), (parY + parSz),
01660                 (parZ + parSz), maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01661         }
01662 
01663       }//end if positive boundary
01664 
01665       //Keys to check if you are a post-ghost
01666       //If the anchor is hanging we need not send it. When some processor searches
01667       //for this node as its primary key and does not find it, it will be
01668       //understood that this is hanging  
01669       if(allBoundaryLeaves[j].getFlag() & ot::TreeNode::NODE) {
01670         //-x
01671         if( myX ) {
01672           anchorMirrors.push_back(ot::TreeNode((myX - 1), myY, myZ, 
01673                 maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01674         }
01675         //-y
01676         if( myY ) {
01677           anchorMirrors.push_back(ot::TreeNode(myX, (myY - 1), myZ, 
01678                 maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01679         }
01680         //-z
01681         if( myZ ) {
01682           anchorMirrors.push_back(ot::TreeNode(myX, myY, (myZ - 1), 
01683                 maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01684         }
01685         //-xy
01686         if( myX && myY ) {
01687           anchorMirrors.push_back(ot::TreeNode((myX - 1), (myY - 1), myZ, 
01688                 maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01689         }
01690         //-yz
01691         if( myY && myZ ) {
01692           anchorMirrors.push_back(ot::TreeNode(myX, (myY - 1), (myZ - 1),
01693                 maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01694         }
01695         //-zx
01696         if( myZ && myX ) {
01697           anchorMirrors.push_back(ot::TreeNode((myX - 1), myY, (myZ - 1),
01698                 maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01699         }
01700         //-xyz
01701         if( myX && myY && myZ ) {
01702           anchorMirrors.push_back(ot::TreeNode((myX - 1), (myY - 1), (myZ - 1),
01703                 maxDepth, dim, maxDepth));
01704         }
01705       }//end if hanging anchor
01706 
01707       std::vector<unsigned int> pIds;
01708       for(int k = 0; k < parVertices.size(); k++) {
01709         unsigned int idx;
01710         seq::maxLowerBound<ot::TreeNode>(minsOfBlocks, parVertices[k], idx, NULL, NULL);
01711         pIds.push_back(idx);
01712       }
01713 
01714       for(int k = 0; k < anchorMirrors.size(); k++) {
01715         unsigned int idx;
01716         seq::maxLowerBound<ot::TreeNode>(minsOfBlocks, anchorMirrors[k], idx, NULL, NULL);
01717         pIds.push_back(idx);
01718       }
01719 
01720       for(int k = 0; k < myVertices.size(); k++) {
01721         unsigned int idx;
01722         seq::maxLowerBound<ot::TreeNode>(minsOfBlocks, myVertices[k], idx, NULL, NULL);
01723         pIds.push_back(idx);
01724       }//end for k
01725 
01726       //Do not send the same octant to the same processor twice 
01727       seq::makeVectorUnique<unsigned int>(pIds, false);
01728 
01729       for(int k = 0; k < pIds.size(); k++) {
01730         //Send to processor pIds[k] 
01731         //Only send to other processors  
01732         if(pIds[k] != myRank) {
01733           sendNodes[pIds[k]].push_back(bdy2elem[j]); 
01734           sendCnt[pIds[k]]++;
01735         }
01736       }//end for k
01737     }//end for j
01738 
01739     PROF_DA_APRIORI_COMM_END
01740   }//end function
01741 
01742   void DA_Initialize(MPI_Comm comm) {
01743     PROF_DA_INIT_BEGIN 
01744 
01745 #ifdef __USE_MG_INIT_TYPE3__
01746       createShapeFnCoeffs_Type3(comm);
01747 #else
01748 #ifdef __USE_MG_INIT_TYPE2__
01749     createShapeFnCoeffs_Type2(comm);
01750 #else
01751     createShapeFnCoeffs_Type1(comm);
01752 #endif
01753 #endif
01754 
01755     PROF_DA_INIT_END 
01756   }
01757 
01758   void DA_Finalize() {
01759     PROF_DA_FINAL_BEGIN 
01760 
01761       for(unsigned int cNum = 0; cNum < 8; cNum++) {
01762         for(unsigned int eType = 0; eType < 18; eType++) {
01763           for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
01764             delete [] (ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i]);
01765             ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i] = NULL;
01766           }
01767           delete [] (ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType]);
01768           ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType] = NULL;
01769         }
01770         delete [] (ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum]);
01771         ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum] = NULL;
01772       }
01773 
01774     delete [] ShapeFnCoeffs;
01775     ShapeFnCoeffs = NULL;
01776 
01777     PROF_DA_FINAL_END 
01778   }
01779 
01780   int createShapeFnCoeffs_Type3(MPI_Comm comm) {
01781     FILE* infile;
01782     int rank;
01783     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank); 
01784     char fname[250];
01785     sprintf(fname,"ShapeFnCoeffs_%d.inp", rank);
01786     infile = fopen(fname,"r");
01787     if(!infile) {
01788       std::cout<<"The file "<<fname<<" is not good for reading."<<std::endl;
01789       assert(false);
01790     }
01791 
01792     typedef double* doublePtr;
01793     typedef doublePtr* double2Ptr;
01794     typedef double2Ptr* double3Ptr;
01795 
01796     ShapeFnCoeffs = new double3Ptr[8];
01797     for(unsigned int cNum = 0; cNum < 8; cNum++) {
01798       ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum] = new double2Ptr[18];
01799       for(unsigned int eType = 0; eType < 18; eType++) {
01800         ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType] = new doublePtr[8];
01801         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
01802           ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i] = new double[8];
01803           for(unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
01804             fscanf(infile,"%lf",&(ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i][j]));
01805           }
01806         }
01807       }
01808     }
01809 
01810     fclose(infile);
01811     return 1;
01812   }
01813 
01814   int createShapeFnCoeffs_Type2(MPI_Comm comm) {
01815     FILE* infile;
01816 
01817     int rank, npes;
01818     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
01819     MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
01820 
01821     const int THOUSAND = 1000;
01822     int numGroups = (npes/THOUSAND);
01823     if( (numGroups*THOUSAND) < npes) {
01824       numGroups++;
01825     }
01826 
01827     MPI_Comm newComm;
01828 
01829     bool* isEmptyList = new bool[npes];
01830     assert(isEmptyList);
01831     for(int i = 0; i < numGroups; i++) {
01832       for(int j = 0; (j < (i*THOUSAND)) && (j < npes); j++) {
01833         isEmptyList[j] = true;
01834       }
01835       for(int j = (i*THOUSAND); (j < ((i+1)*THOUSAND)) && (j < npes); j++) {
01836         isEmptyList[j] = false;
01837       }
01838       for(int j = ((i + 1)*THOUSAND); j < npes; j++) {
01839         isEmptyList[j] = true;
01840       }
01841       MPI_Comm tmpComm;
01842       par::splitComm2way(isEmptyList, &tmpComm, comm);
01843       if(!(isEmptyList[rank])) {
01844         newComm = tmpComm;
01845       }
01846     }//end for i
01847     delete [] isEmptyList;
01848 
01849     if((rank % THOUSAND) == 0) {
01850       char fname[250];
01851       sprintf(fname,"ShapeFnCoeffs_%d.inp", (rank/THOUSAND));
01852       infile = fopen(fname,"r");
01853       if(!infile) {
01854         std::cout<<"The file "<<fname<<" is not good for reading."<<std::endl;
01855         assert(false);
01856       }
01857     }
01858 
01859     typedef double* doublePtr;
01860     typedef doublePtr* double2Ptr;
01861     typedef double2Ptr* double3Ptr;
01862 
01863     ShapeFnCoeffs = new double3Ptr[8];
01864     for(unsigned int cNum = 0; cNum < 8; cNum++) {
01865       ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum] = new double2Ptr[18];
01866       for(unsigned int eType = 0; eType < 18; eType++) {
01867         ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType] = new doublePtr[8];
01868         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
01869           ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i] = new double[8];
01870           if((rank % THOUSAND) == 0){
01871             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
01872               fscanf(infile,"%lf",&(ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i][j]));
01873             }
01874           }
01875         }
01876       }
01877     }
01878 
01879     if((rank % THOUSAND) == 0){
01880       fclose(infile);
01881     }
01882 
01883     double * tmpMat = new double[9216];
01884     assert(tmpMat);
01885 
01886     if((rank % THOUSAND) == 0) {
01887       unsigned int ctr = 0;
01888       for(unsigned int cNum = 0; cNum < 8; cNum++) {
01889         for(unsigned int eType = 0; eType < 18; eType++) {
01890           for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
01891             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
01892               tmpMat[ctr] = ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i][j];
01893               ctr++;
01894             }
01895           }
01896         }
01897       }
01898     }
01899 
01900     par::Mpi_Bcast<double>(tmpMat,9216, 0, newComm);
01901 
01902     if((rank % THOUSAND) != 0) {
01903       unsigned int ctr = 0;
01904       for(unsigned int cNum = 0; cNum < 8; cNum++) {
01905         for(unsigned int eType = 0; eType < 18; eType++) {
01906           for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
01907             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
01908               ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i][j] = tmpMat[ctr];
01909               ctr++;
01910             }
01911           }
01912         }
01913       }
01914     }
01915 
01916     delete [] tmpMat;
01917 
01918     return 1;
01919   }//end of function

01922     FILE* infile;
01923     int rank;
01924     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
01925     if(!rank) {
01926       char fname[250];
01927       sprintf(fname,"ShapeFnCoeffs.inp");
01928       infile = fopen(fname,"r");
01929       if(!infile) {
01930         std::cout<<"The file "<<fname<<" is not good for reading."<<std::endl;
01931         assert(false);
01932       }
01933     }
01934 
01935     typedef double* doublePtr;
01936     typedef doublePtr* double2Ptr;
01937     typedef double2Ptr* double3Ptr;
01938 
01939     ShapeFnCoeffs = new double3Ptr[8];
01940     for(unsigned int cNum = 0; cNum < 8; cNum++) {
01941       ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum] = new double2Ptr[18];
01942       for(unsigned int eType = 0; eType < 18; eType++) {
01943         ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType] = new doublePtr[8];
01944         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
01945           ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i] = new double[8];
01946           if(!rank){
01947             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
01948               fscanf(infile,"%lf",&(ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i][j]));
01949             }
01950           }
01951         }
01952       }
01953     }
01954 
01955     if(!rank){
01956       fclose(infile);
01957     }
01958 
01959     double * tmpMat = new double[9216];
01960     assert(tmpMat);
01961 
01962     if(!rank) {
01963       unsigned int ctr = 0;
01964       for(unsigned int cNum = 0; cNum < 8; cNum++) {
01965         for(unsigned int eType = 0; eType < 18; eType++) {
01966           for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
01967             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
01968               tmpMat[ctr] = ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i][j];
01969               ctr++;
01970             }
01971           }
01972         }
01973       }
01974     }
01975 
01976     par::Mpi_Bcast<double>(tmpMat,9216, 0, comm);
01977 
01978     if(rank) {
01979       unsigned int ctr = 0;
01980       for(unsigned int cNum = 0; cNum < 8; cNum++) {
01981         for(unsigned int eType = 0; eType < 18; eType++) {
01982           for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
01983             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
01984               ShapeFnCoeffs[cNum][eType][i][j] = tmpMat[ctr];
01985               ctr++;
01986             }
01987           }
01988         }
01989       }
01990     }
01991 
01992     delete [] tmpMat;
01993 
01994     return 1;
01995   }//end of function
